taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a user-defined domain model file opened in the editor.
taskbody.context: The domain contains at least one class, which we can call "A" for example purposes. The following steps explains how to create a composition pointing to another class "B", meaning an association by value with cardinality many.

step.cmd: Add a new association by reference with cardinality one in the class "B", pointing to the class "A".
Add a reverse association with cardinality many to this new association.

taskbody.result: Class "A" contains a composition pointing to class "B".
taskbody.example: You can find many examples in the Triple'A Plus standard packaging after importing the meta-dictionary. One such example would be a portfolio entity having a composition pointing to a denomination entity.
